contentrichtext.text: '''Daigo''' may refer to: ==People== *[[Emperor Daigo]], Emperor of Japan between 897 and 930 *Daigo family, a branch of the [[Ichijō family]] of Japanese nobility *[[Daigo (name)]] ==Places== *[[Daigo Temple]], from which Emperor Daigo took his name *[[Daigo, Fushimi, Kyoto]], a district in the ward of [[Fushimi-ku, Kyoto]] *[[Daigo Station (Kyoto)]], a train station *[[Daigo Station (Akita)]], a train station *[[Daigo, Ibaraki]], a town in Ibaraki Prefecture ==Other uses== *[[Daigo (Zen)]], a great enlightenment in Zen Buddhism *[[Daigo (cheese)]], a type of cheese made in ancient Japan {{disambiguation}}
